text: Yes it requires a coded template. Our just put your code in a custom module the outside will be wrapped but everything inside will not.

Ummm... Friday afternoon brain, but is there a way to preview the blog author page on a blog template that's not published? I toggle the "blog_listing" parameter in the preview URL (like <https://preview.hs-sites.com/_hcms/preview/template/multi?blog_listing=true&content_group_id=null&is_buffered_template_layout=true&portalId=12345&tc_deviceCategory=undefined&template_layout_id=123456789&updated=1551284796492>) to see the post/listing pages but I'm not 100% sure how to show a client what the author page will look like
